languages.text: "Не за что просить прощения — у вас получилось подчинить силы, чтобы помочь другому. Помочь мне. Благодарю".

traits.locale_text: "Не за что просить прощения — у вас получилось подчинить силы, чтобы помочь другому. Помочь мне. Благодарю".

languages.text: "There is no need to apologise — you mastered the power in order to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."
languages.original_text: "Не за что просить прощения — у вас получилось подчинить силы, чтобы помочь другому. Помочь мне. Благодарю".

traits.locale_text: "There is no need to apologize — you managed to master the power to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."
"There is no need to apologize — you managed to master the power to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."
"There is no need to apologize — you mastered the power in order to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."
"There is no need to apologize — you mastered the power in order to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."
"There is no need to apologise — you mastered the power in order to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."

languages.text: “你没必要道歉。你掌握了这样的能力，是为了帮助别人，帮助我。我对此很感激。”
languages.original_text: "There is no need to apologise — you mastered the power in order to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: “你没必要道歉。你掌握了这样的能力，是为了帮助别人，帮助我。我对此很感激。”

languages.text: «No tiene por qué disculparse. Dominó ese poder para ayudar a alguien. Para ayudarme a mí. Se lo agradezco».
languages.original_text: "There is no need to apologise — you mastered the power in order to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: «No tiene por qué disculparse. Dominó ese poder para ayudar a alguien. Para ayudarme a mí. Se lo agradezco».

languages.text: 「謝る必要はない…お前は他者を助けるために力を習得したんだ。私を助けるためにな。感謝する」
languages.original_text: "There is no need to apologise — you mastered the power in order to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: 「謝る必要はない…お前は他者を助けるために力を習得したんだ。私を助けるためにな。感謝する」

languages.text: "Ihr müsst Euch nicht entschuldigen — Ihr macht die Macht gemeistert, um anderen zu helfen. Um mir zu helfen. Ich bin Euch dankbar."
languages.original_text: "There is no need to apologise — you mastered the power in order to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst Euch nicht entschuldigen — Ihr macht die Macht gemeistert, um anderen zu helfen. Um mir zu helfen. Ich bin Euch dankbar."

languages.text: « Inutile de vous excuser. Vous avez maîtrisé votre pouvoir pour venir en aide à quelqu'un. Pour me venir en aide à moi. Et je vous en suis {mf|reconnaissant|reconnaissante}. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need to apologise — you mastered the power in order to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de vous excuser. Vous avez maîtrisé votre pouvoir pour venir en aide à quelqu'un. Pour me venir en aide à moi. Et je vous en suis {mf|reconnaissant|reconnaissante}. »

languages.text: "Özre gerek yok. Bu güçte başkalarına yardım için ustalaşmışsın. Onlardan biri de benim. Sana minnettarım."
languages.original_text: "There is no need to apologise — you mastered the power in order to aid another. To aid me. I am grateful."

traits.locale_text: "Özür dilemene gerek yok. Bu gücünün hünerlerini, hem başkalarına hem de bana yardım etmek için geliştirdin. Sana minnettarım."
